page.title: 07Woodham Village and Housing
page.content: *************************** Woodham Village is located to the west of a farming community called Woodham that had its origins in pre-Norman times. Woodham Village relates alot to historic past and its srong equestrian associations. Meticulous planning has gone into ensuring that the completed development of Woodham Village will provide community facilities to a high standard. Development on the site began in 1982 and when completed there will be about 1000 houses and a population of 3000 by the end of the 1980's. There is a wide range of housing in Woodham Village. Depending on whether you live on a Heritage, Mcleans or Brosley site the style of homes will change and so will the prices. On a Heritage, price ranges from 12750-56500 pounds. A Mcleans, 19350-40450 pounds.
